attributes.action: Fine Drivers Who Blink Whilst Driving
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Drivers who blink at the wheel are taking their eyes off the road for anything up to 10 milliseconds.

The laws against drivers are not nearly severe enough. We petition the Prime Minister to fine drivers who carelessly blink whilst at the wheel!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
